name: Quirky Qutie
description:
>>>  Controls:

R Key: Restart Layout

WASD/ Arrows: Movement

W or Up Key: Jump

6: Pink (Normal State)

7: Green (Happy State)

8: Blue (Sad State)

9: Red (Angry State)

0: Yellow (Dazed State)

E Key: Talk with NPCs (Not really working yet, still figuring out how to do the dialogue system.)

J Key: Teleport (Bullet)

K Key: Teleport (Player)

>>>  Description:

A 2D platformer with a few mechanics inspired by the Super Princess Peach game for the (2006) DS game.

Players would be able to change the emotional state of the character, giving the player different abilities, like higher + floating jumps, pushing large objects, teleporting and more!
